## Bundle.BundleNormalizer class

Normalizes ResourceManagerBuilder instances to ensure consistent ordering of internal entities, enabling order-independent bundle checksums.

The normalization process rebuilds the ResourceManagerBuilder from the ground up in a canonical order to ensure identical index assignments regardless of original construction order.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BundleNormalizer 
```

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[normalize(originalBuilder, systemConfig)](./ts-res.bundle.bundlenormalizer.normalize.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

Creates a normalized ResourceManagerBuilder from an existing builder. The normalized builder will have identical entities but arranged in canonical order to ensure consistent index assignments.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[normalizeFromPredefined(originalBuilder, configName)](./ts-res.bundle.bundlenormalizer.normalizefrompredefined.md)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

Creates a normalized ResourceManagerBuilder using a predefined system configuration. This is a convenience method for the common case of using predefined configurations.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
